attributes.action: TO CHANGE THE BALLOT PAPERS TO INCLUDE "NO CONFIDENCE IN ANY CANDIDATE" VOTE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
DUE TO THE LACK OF FAITH PEOPLE NOW HAVE IN ANY FORM OF GOVERNMENT AND OF THE OPPOSING PARTIES.
I REQUEST THE "NO CONFIDENCE IN ANY CANDIDATE" VOTE WHICH I FEEL PEOPLE WOULD GENUINELY USE TO PROVE HOW DISOLUTIONED THEY ARE WITH THE POLITICAL PARTIES AND THEIR CANDIDATE AT ELECTIONS!

AT THIS PRESENT TIME PEOPLE ONLY ABSTANE FROM VOTING AND IT DOES NOT REALLY SHOW IF THEY ARE UNHAPPY WITH THE ELECTORIAL SYSTEM, THIS WOULD ENDOWE THE PEOPLE THE POWER TO SHOW THEY ARE UNHAPPY!

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/NonVotes/

When submitting petitions, please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
